full_summary:
## Multifunction Robotic Platforms Tender

### Solicitation Overview

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC), is releasing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of multifunction robotic platforms and accessories. The purpose of this procurement is to provide military intelligence, surveillance, target acquisition, and reconnaissance capabilities.

### Background

The solicitation number is W7701-247851. Amendments to the RFP may be issued at any time during the CTC period. The contracting authority is PSPC.

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: W7701-247851
* **Publication Date**: December 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: January 11, 2024, 14:00:00 EST
* **Contracting Authority**: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
* **Delivery Location**: Quebec, Canada

### Goods and Services Required

The contracting authority seeks to acquire multifunctional robotic platforms and accessories to support military intelligence, surveillance, target acquisition, and reconnaissance activities.

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection criteria includes a combined rating of technical merit and price. The evaluation will be based on the merits of the bids received.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to bidders under various trade agreements, including the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

### Contact Information

For more information, please visit the following website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18322055](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18322055). Contact Daniel Boisclair (SPAC/PSPC) at [daniel.boisclair@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daniel.boisclair@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for any questions or concerns.

### Documents

The solicitation documents can be downloaded from the website above. It is the bidder's responsibility to ensure that they have read and understood the terms and conditions of the solicitation before submitting a bid.
